title: forge script failed
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [ ] Foundry
- [ ] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.2.0 (d70aea4 2023-02-16T00:15:56.365073Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

RUST_BACKTRACE=full forge script script/MyLockProxy.s.sol:DeployMyLockProxyScript --legacy --broadcast --rpc-url $POLARIS_TESTNET_URL

### Operating System

macOS (Intel)

### Describe the bug

 RUST_BACKTRACE=full forge script script/MyLockProxy.s.sol:DeployMyLockProxyScript --legacy --broadcast --rpc-url $POLARIS_TESTNET_URL
[⠢] Compiling...The application panicked (crashed).
Message:  checksum not found
Location: /Users/runner/.cargo/git/checkouts/ethers-rs-c3a7c0a0ae0fe6be/a69036f/ethers-solc/src/compile/mod.rs:463

This is a bug. Consider reporting it at https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry
